name: Atlantikos
notes: Offers seafood entrees from both the Mediterranean and Atlantic Coasts.
Features a 'Raw Bar' with choices of oysters, shrimp cocktail, Alaskan king crab legs, whole belly clams, and Maine lobster.

name: Bonefish Grill
notes: Features a 'From the Sea', 'From the Land', and 'From the Dock' options of entrees.
'Perfect Pairing' choices include: Mahi-Mahi & Shrimp, Sirloin & Crab Cake, Filet & Lobster Tail, Sirloin & Shrimp, and Chicken & Shrimp.

name: The Capital Grille
notes: Offers a 'Thanksgiving at Home' option, where customers can order a variety of holiday side dishes, including: brioche stuffing, housemade gravy, mashed potatoes, sweet potatoes with hot honey, French green beans, cranberry sauce, and seeded rolls.

name: Ferraro's Kitchen
entree: Ravioli Aragosta e Tartufo Fresco: Ravioli stuffed with Maine lobster claw and topped with a fresh truffle butter.
notes: Received a 'The Best Winelist in Town' award from Wine Spectator in 2021.
Meet the Chef: Igor Ferraro. A native of Venice, Italy, inspired by Italian culture to bring the heart of Italian cuisine into his diverse menu.

name: Le Zoo
notes: Focuses on capturing the common ground between French elegance and the effortless South Florida sophistication.
Le Zoo is an energetic celebration of French Mediterranean cooking.

name: OLA Restaurant
notes: Chef Carlos Castro has brought the essential flavors of Latin America to OLA Restaurant in Miami Beach.
Caribbean flavors are featured in dishes such as the Beef Tenderloin Currasco and Florida Sweet Corn Empanda.

name: Santorini by Georgios
notes: A perfect Greek feast.
A taste of Greece in the heart of South Beach

name: Stubborn Seed
notes: Chef Ford aims to unearth cravings of the palate while constructing a reward in each bite.

name: The Surf Club
notes: An oceanfront destination bringing a new era of glamour elevated with chic Italian cuisine.

name: Yard House
notes: Yard House Happy Hour is held every Monday through Friday from 3:00pm - 7:30pm and Sunday through Wednesday from 10:00 to close.
Happy Hour specials include half-priced select appetizers and pizzas, $2 off all draft beer, wine, spirits, and cocktails.
Yard House aims to make an enjoyable experience through great music, great seaside atmosphere, and a diverse menu stemmed from California roots.

name: Yardbird Table & Bar
notes: Yardbird has locations in Miami, Las Vegas, Dallas, Washington D.C., Singapore, and Chicago.

For $635.00, you can order a 'Thanksgiving To-Go' meal that serves 10-12 people. The holiday meal includes: a whole herb roasted turkey, mash potatoes, sage & celery stuffing, green bean casserole, bourbon brown butter glazed yams, fresh cranberry relish, and honey butter biscuits.
